heading: Physical Attributes
qText: My physique is thin - I don't gain weight easily.

heading: Physical Attributes
qText: I am quick and active.

heading: Physical Attributes
qText: My skin is usually dry, more so in winter.

heading: Physical Attributes
qText: My hands and feet are usually cold.

heading: Physical Attributes
qText: My energy fluctuates and comes in bursts.

heading: Physical Attributes
qText: I usually develop gas or constipation.

heading: Physical Attributes
qText: I usually have difficulty falling asleep or having a sound night's sleep.

heading: Physical Attributes
qText: I am uncomfortable in cold weather.

heading: Mental, Emotional and Behavioral Attributes
qText: My nature is lively and enthusiastic.

heading: Mental, Emotional and Behavioral Attributes
qText: I have difficulty memorizing things and remembering them later.

heading: Mental, Emotional and Behavioral Attributes
qText: It is easy for me to learn new things quickly, but I also forget quickly.

heading: Mental, Emotional and Behavioral Attributes
qText: I am not good at making decisions.

heading: Mental, Emotional and Behavioral Attributes
qText: I am anxious or worrisome by nature.

heading: Mental, Emotional and Behavioral Attributes
qText: People think I'm talkative and that I talk quickly.

heading: Mental, Emotional and Behavioral Attributes
qText: I am usually emotional by nature and my moods fluctuate.

heading: Mental, Emotional and Behavioral Attributes
qText: My mind is restless, but also imaginative.

heading: Physical Attributes
qText: My hair is fine, straight, light, blonde, red, graying early, or balding.

heading: Physical Attributes
qText: I don't tolerate hot weather.

heading: Physical Attributes
qText: I sweat easily.

heading: Physical Attributes
qText: I can't tolerate delaying or skipping a meal.

heading: Physical Attributes
qText: My appetite is very good and I can eat big meals.

heading: Physical Attributes
qText: My bowel movements are regular. I might have occasional loose stool but not much constipation.

heading: Physical Attributes
qText: I like cold drinks and such foods as ice cream.

heading: Physical Attributes
qText: I often feel hot.

heading: Physical Attributes
qText: Spicy, hot foods upset my stomach.

heading: Mental, Emotional and Behavioral Attributes
qText: I consider myself efficient.

heading: Mental, Emotional and Behavioral Attributes
qText: I try to be organized and accurate.

heading: Mental, Emotional and Behavioral Attributes
qText: I have a strong will and my friends think I am stubborn.

heading: Mental, Emotional and Behavioral Attributes
qText: I am impatient by nature.

heading: Mental, Emotional and Behavioral Attributes
qText: I tend to become irritable or angry quite easily.

heading: Mental, Emotional and Behavioral Attributes
qText: I try to be meticulous and am a perfectionist by nature.

heading: Mental, Emotional and Behavioral Attributes
qText: I get angry easily, but I don't hold a grudge.

heading: Mental, Emotional and Behavioral Attributes
qText: I am usually critical of myself and others.

heading: Physical Attributes
qText: It is easy for me to gain weight but difficult to lose.

heading: Physical Attributes
qText: Skipping meals is easy for me and does not cause any problems.

heading: Physical Attributes
qText: I tend to have congestion, mucus, or sinus problems.

heading: Physical Attributes
qText: I'm a sound sleeper.

heading: Physical Attributes
qText: I have thick, oily, dark, wavy hair.

heading: Physical Attributes
qText: My skin is smooth and soft with an almost pale complexion.

heading: Physical Attributes
qText: My body frame is large and solid with a heavy bone structure.

heading: Physical Attributes
qText: My digestion is slow, so I feel full after eating.

heading: Physical Attributes
qText: I have a steady energy level with good endurance and strong stamina.

heading: Physical Attributes
qText: I'm sensitive to cool and damp weather.

heading: Mental, Emotional and Behavioral Attributes
qText: I tend to be slow, methodical, and relaxed.

heading: Mental, Emotional and Behavioral Attributes
qText: I need to sleep a minimum of eight hours to feel well the next morning.

heading: Mental, Emotional and Behavioral Attributes
qText: By nature I am calm and composed. I don't get angry easily.

heading: Mental, Emotional and Behavioral Attributes
qText: I am not a quick learner but I am good at memorizing things and remembering them later.

heading: Mental, Emotional and Behavioral Attributes
qText: Many people consider me affectionate, forgiving, and peaceful.

heading: Mental, Emotional and Behavioral Attributes
qText: I usually oversleep and have difficulty waking up the next morning.

heading: Mental, Emotional and Behavioral Attributes
qText: I am very reluctant to take on new responsibilities.
